name: CreateNewDepartment
description:
Create a new Department in Freshservice.

This tool is used to create a new department, or company in MSP mode, within Freshservice. Call this tool when you need to add a new organizational unit in the Freshservice platform.

parameters.name: department_unique_id
parameters.description: A unique integer identifier for the department being created.

parameters.name: department_name
parameters.description: The name of the department to be created in Freshservice.

parameters.name: department_description
parameters.description: Detailed description of the department being created in Freshservice.

parameters.name: head_user_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the head of the department.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the head of the department

parameters.name: prime_user_identifier
parameters.description: Unique identifier for the primary agent or requester of the department.

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the prime user of the department

parameters.name: department_email_domains
parameters.description: Email domains associated with the department, provided as a list of strings.

value_schema.description: Email domains associated with the department

parameters.name: department_custom_fields
parameters.description: JSON object representing custom fields associated with a Freshservice department entity. This can include fields like additional metadata or specific attributes relevant to the department.

value_schema.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity

parameters.name: department_creation_timestamp
parameters.description: The timestamp indicating when the department was created, formatted as a string.

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the department was created

parameters.name: last_modified_timestamp
parameters.description: Timestamp indicating when the department was last modified. Use ISO 8601 format.

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the department was last modified

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Freshservice API.

parameters.name: head_user_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the head of the department

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the head of the department

parameters.name: prime_user_id
parameters.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the prime user of the department

value_schema.description: Unique identifier of the agent or requester who serves as the prime user of the department

parameters.name: domains
parameters.description: Email domains associated with the department

value_schema.description: Email domains associated with the department

parameters.name: custom_fields
parameters.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity

value_schema.description: Custom fields that are associated with a Freshservice entity

parameters.name: created_at
parameters.description: Timestamp at which the department was created

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the department was created

parameters.name: updated_at
parameters.description: Timestamp at which the department was last modified

value_schema.description: Timestamp at which the department was last modified
